### Test Results

```{r echo = FALSE}

path = 'docs/testlog'

files = dir(path, pattern = '.txt$')

mdown_list = paste0("- [", files, "](testlog/", files, '){:target="_blank"}' ) %>%
  paste( collapse = '\n')

tibble( files = str_split(mdown_list, "\n")[[1]] ) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

<br> 

### Rules

```{r echo = FALSE}
tibble( snakemake_report = paste0('[',
          params$rules_to_report,
          '](snakemake_report/',
          params$rules_to_report,
          '.html){:target="_blank"}'),
        workflow = paste0('![',
          params$rules_to_report,
          '](wflow/',
          params$rules_to_report,
          '.png){:target="_blank"}')
          ) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
